title: Elbow Grease Double Sided Microfibre Cleaning & Polishing Cloth - 2 in 1 Antibacterial, Non Scratch, Cuts Through Grease & Grime | Cleans & Polishes (1 Cloth Pack)
features: DOUBLE-SIDED CLEANING POWER: One side has an abrasive texture designed to tackle stubborn stains, grease, and grime on pots, pans, and ovens without scratching. The reverse soft side provides gentle cleaning around the home, including glass, ensuring every clean is streak-free.
ANTIBACTERIAL PROTECTION: The Elbow Grease double sided microfibre cloth is infused with antibacterial properties that help prevent bacterial growth on the cloth.
SUPER ABSORBENT MATERIAL: Designed to soak up liquids quickly and effectively, this cloth is ideal for wiping spills around the home and cleaning wet surfaces without leaving streaks or smears.
VERSATILE CLEANING TOOL: Perfect for both tough scrubbing and gentle polishing, it can be used on kitchen appliances, tables, glass surfaces, and even during car cleaning tasks.
NON SCRATCH SIDE: Clean stubborn residue and stains on plates, pans, and oven racks or trays confidently, knowing the abrasive side won’t damage or scratch cookware or surfaces
SOFT AND GENTLE SIDE: Perfect for polishing kitchen & bathroom surfaces, glassware, mirrors & car interiors, leaving them streak-free and shining. Use the cloth wet or dry.

SMEAR FREE, STREAK FREE CLEANING: The new Elbow Grease Microfibre Cloth is made of extremely tiny fibres about 100 times thinner than a human hair, enabling them to remove dirt and dust from microscopic sized crevices which larger fibres can miss

REUSABLE AND DURABLE: Made from high-quality microfibre, this Elbow Grease cloth is designed for long-lasting use. It can be washed without losing effectiveness. Handwash or machine clean, up to 40 degrees. Do not use bleach.
EASY TO USE WET OR DRY: Whether dampened with water or used dry, this double sided cleaning cloth adapts to various tasks, from wiping spills and tackling tough stains to dusting delicate surfaces.

MULTI-PURPOSE CLEANING SOLUTION: Suitable for kitchen or bathroom cleaning. The Elbow Grease microfibre cloth can be used as dish cloths, for polishing and car cleaning, making it a truly versatile home essential.
description: From the manufacturer Double Sided Cleaning Power One side features an abrasive texture designed to tackle stubborn stains, grease, and grime on pots, pans, and ovens without leaving scratches. The soft side provides a gentle touch for kitchen surfaces, glassware, and delicate items, ensuring every clean is streak-free. Easily Wipe Away Grease & Grime Our microfibre cloths are made of extremely tiny fibres about 100 times thinner than a human hair , enabling them to remove dirt and dust from microscopic sized crevices which larger fibre cloths can miss. It also has antibacterial properties to help stop bacterial growth on the cloth and around the home. Try Our Growing Elbow Grease Range Elbow Grease is a firm favourite of Mrs. Hinch , the social media sensation together with her army of Hinchers. Tackle dirt and grime around your home with our every growing Elbow Grease range - from kitchen cleaners and glass sprays to toilet foam and handy scrubbing pads.
